snippet: Ayman al-Zawahri, Al Qaeda's leader, confirmed the death of his deputy, Abu Yahya al-Libi, in a video message posted on jihadist Internet forums late Monday.
abstract: Ayman al-Zawahri, Al Qaeda's leader, confirmed the death of his deputy, Abu Yahya al-Libi, in a video message posted on jihadist Internet forums late Monday.

headline.main: Qaeda Leader Confirms Death of His Deputy
